Detailed Description

Configuration pipe server.

This class creates and manages an asynchronous named pipe for serving configuration information to a MACSim client. Information is obtained by calling the MACSimServerInterface specified at construct time.

Definition at line 91 of file macsim.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ConfigServer::ConfigServer (  MACSimServerInterface *  p_interface  )  [inline]
 

Constructor, initialises Server parent as a configuration pipe.

Stores the interface pointer in member variable m_interface and configures the Server as a configuration pipe handler.

  • The server name is set to "configuration"
  • The pipe name is set to MAC_CONFIG_PIPE_NAME
  • input and output buffer sizes are set to sizeof(DWORD)
Parameters:
p_interface The interface to use for obtaining configuration information.

Definition at line 122 of file macsim.h.

Member Function Documentation

void ConfigServer::serverFunc (  void *  request,
void *  reply
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Server function, responds to configuration requests

Receives a single DWORD request from the client and responds with a single DWORD answer obtained by calling the appropriate function on m_interface.

Parameters:
request A pointer to the request buffer, this will be sizeof(DWORD) bytes long
reply A pointer to the reply buffer, this will be sizeof(DWORD) bytes long

Reimplemented from Server.
